data.oai_dc:dc: PISCO: Intertidal: site temperature data: Raramai, New Zealand (RRMX00)

This metadata record describes a mix of intertidal seawater and air temperature data collected at Raramai, New Zealand by PISCO. Measurements were collected using StowAway TidbiT Temperature Loggers (Onset Computer Corp. TBI32-05+37) beginning 2003-03-16. Site temperature loggers are bolted down in a wire cage at locations within each site in the High, Mid, and/or Low zones. Temperature is recorded at 1 hour intervals.
